subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: I see you have found my riddle bank.

subtree.speaker: Guardian
subtree.line: If you jump and hit the bottom of these boxes you shall find images in your mind of what the answers to my riddles are

subtree.speaker: Gaurdsman
subtree.line: The first is this: There is a house. One enters it blind and comes out seeing. What is it?

subtree.speaker: Gaurdsman
subtree.line: The second is this: What goes on four legs in the morning, on two legs at noon, and on three legs in the evening?

subtree.speaker: Gaurdsman
subtree.line: The this is this: This thing all things devours; Birds, beasts, trees, flowers; Gnaws iron, bites steel; Grinds hard stones to meal; Slays king, ruins town, And beats mountain down.

subtree.speaker: Gaurdsman
subtree.line: Answer these three, and I will give you my next trial.
